All the while, autocrats all over the world are on the rise. RT @JStein_WaPo Trump wants Europe to match US military spending

But what if we matched Europe's?

We could:
- Give health care to 29M uninsured in US
- Build 10M new housing units, cut child poverty in half
- Retire $1.4T in student debt, pass free college & preK

More:
https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2018/07/12/what-america-could-do-with-european-levels-military-spending/?utm_term=.471d0598b951

The Trump Administration is implementing a new policy that will result in potentially thousands of asylum seekers being turned away before they can plead their case at the border. Let’s be clear, this Administration is refusing entry to those who face certain violence and harm.

It is the people, in open primaries and caucuses, who should determine the Democratic nominee for president - not well-connected "super-delegates." This is an important step forward in making the Democratic Party more democratic and transparent. https://www.nytimes.com/2018/07/11/us/politics/superdelegates-democratic-party.html

Proud to introduce the North Texas Water Supply Security Act w my North #TX colleagues. This will ensure resolution of any litigation brought to challenge the Lower Bois d’Arc Creek Reservoir Project in order to make certain that the project can be completed in a timely manner.

RETWEET if you agree. https://twitter.com/kylegriffin1/status/1017550596151357446 QT @kylegriffin1 Jared Kushner lacks the security clearance level required to review some of the government's most sensitive secrets, two people familiar tell WaPo.

Kushner has not been approved to review "sensitive compartmented information," better known as SCI.

I'm proud to stand with Vermont nurses in their fight for a fair contract that treats them with respect and dignity. At the end of the day, this struggle is about priorities. It’s about prioritizing patient care over profits. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dh77VWqW0AEdekn.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1017526160698290176/vid/320x180/REixPXPq2AvrsD2y.mp4?tag=3

Mr. Bezos, here's another idea. Pay your workers enough so that thousands of them no longer have to rely on food stamps.

For far too long, bureaucratic red tape has left projects like Lower Bois d’Arc Creek Reservoir unfinished. By eliminating those delays, this bill will help address the looming water crisis facing North Texas and provide certainty to Texas’ water supply.-->https://www.cruz.senate.gov/?p=press_release&id=3949

RT @amyklobuchar At Judiciary.  Once again requested oversight hearing on Administration’s inhumane policy of separating kids from parents. Senator Grassley says if he had known three weeks ago what he knows now he would have had the hearing. Appreciate the candor. But now we need the hearing.
I will continue to support the brave men and women who serve as ICE agents, and urge my colleagues to stand by ICE and honor the key role it plays in keeping our country safe.

ICE agents are the front line when it comes to enforcing our immigration laws. They risk their lives on a daily basis to protect American citizens and immigrants from violent criminals, drug cartels, and human traffickers.

What do the Russians have on Donald Trump politically, financially and personally that he refuses to hold Putin accountable for attacking our democracy? He blasts our allies while he cozies up to our adversaries.

After Republicans in DC passed the #GOPTaxScam for the rich:

🚫 The Koch Family gave Paul Ryan $500,000.00.

🚫 Sheldon Adelson handed the GOP $30,000,000.00.

🚫 A House Republican sitting Member bought a multi-million dollar yacht.

Republican “leaders” sure are #BetterOffNow.

Calls to abolish ICE not only disregard our immigration laws and give implicit license to those who want to enter our country illegally, they also smear the heroic sacrifices of ICE agents and put people at risk, especially in border states like #Texas.

Secretary Nielsen made a request for asylum seekers to go to ports of entry to legally apply for asylum. Now, her department has implemented a policy that makes it nearly impossible for victims of domestic violence & gang violence to do just that. It's cruel. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1017452001960087552/img/UurBzJf34Z79F00e.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1017452001960087552/vid/320x180/3lwiiyO-0pMPkdyT.mp4?tag=3
